cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: to float, superficial, floating, unstable, movable, provisional, temporary, transient, impetuous, hollow, inflated, to exceed, superfluous, excessive, surplus

exm.mng: to float up, to rise to the surface, fig. to rise in the world
to float (in the air etc), suspension
passing thought, an idea that comes into one's head, recollection
to float, to hover, also written 漂浮
fickle and impatient, restless, giddy, scatterbrained
ups and downs (of life etc), to drift along, to sink and emerge
